Title: Lady Bloodfight
Writer: Bey Logan, Bey Logan (screenplay), Judd Bloch (screenplay)
Actors: Amy Johnston, Muriel Hofmann, Jenny Wu, Kathy Wu
Plot: Upon arriving in Hong Kong, an American woman is beaten up and mugged by thugs. She's taken in by a martial arts master who trains her for a formidable fight competition known as the Kumite.
